Hyeongseop

Lew

Introduction

HyeongseopXEuiwoong (Korean: 형섭X의웅; Japanese: ヒョンソプXウィウン) is a male duo under Yue Hua Entertainment. They debuted on November 2, 2017 with the single album "The Moment of Memory". They both debuted as members of the boy group TEMPEST on March 2, 2022.
